prompt:
Create 4 prompts for a cohesive, chronologically flowing Thank you - AI for Good Conference greeting card that tells a visual story (9:16 ratio):

ðŸŽ¨ CREATIVITY MANDATE: Be genuinely creative, unique, and innovative! Avoid generic or clichÃ© designs. Think outside the box, surprise with unexpected elements, use bold artistic choices, and create something truly memorable and special. Push creative boundaries while staying appropriate for the card type and tone.

Theme: "Create a card saying thank you for attending AI for Good Conference at Stanford, CA June 2025. thank them for helping prosper the "
Style: âœ¨ Smart Style
Tone: ðŸ˜„ Funny - humorous and lighthearted
To: Jessica Greenwalt

Message: "Jessica,
Thanks for joining us at the AI for Good Conference! It was great to see so many brilliant minds focused on creating a better future, and not just teaching robots to be better at Wordle than us. We're so glad you were part of it!"

Reference: "artistic transformation"

CRITICAL: Create a cohesive visual narrative that flows chronologically through the card experience:
1. FRONT COVER: First impression - sets the scene/introduces the story
2. INTERIOR SPREAD: The heart of the experience - continuation and climax of the visual story
3. BACK COVER: Conclusion - peaceful resolution or complementary ending

Requirements:
- Flat 2D artwork for printing (not 3D card images)
- Full-bleed backgrounds extending to edges
- IMPORTANT: Keep text, faces, and key elements at least 10% away from top/bottom edges (small amount may be cropped in printing)
- Keep text/faces 0.5" from left/right edges for safe printing
- CONSISTENT visual elements throughout: same characters, color palette, lighting, art style
- Progressive visual storytelling from front â†’ interior â†’ back
- Put any text in quotes and make it clear/readable
- Each section should feel like part of the same artistic universe
- TONE: Ensure the visual mood and atmosphere matches the humorous and lighthearted tone throughout all sections
- INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY SAFETY: If the user mentions specific characters, brands, logos, or products, automatically replace them with original generic alternatives in your prompts. For example: replace specific character names with "cartoon mouse character" or "superhero character", replace brand names with "colorful cereal" or "sports car", etc. Create inspired-by designs that capture the essence without referencing any protected names or specific copyrighted elements. Never include actual brand names, character names, or trademarked terms in the image generation prompts
- CONTENT SAFETY: Ensure all prompts are family-friendly and appropriate for greeting cards. Avoid any content that could be flagged by safety systems including: violence, weapons, inappropriate imagery, political content, controversial topics, scary or disturbing elements, or anything not suitable for all ages. If the user requests something potentially inappropriate, redirect to positive, wholesome alternatives that capture their intent in a family-friendly way
- Include visual humor, playful elements, and whimsical details





- Create cartoon/illustrated characters inspired by reference image - DO NOT make realistic depictions

Create prompts that flow chronologically:

1. Front Cover (Opening Scene): BE GENUINELY CREATIVE AND UNIQUE! Include "Thank you - AI for Good Conference" greeting text positioned safely in the center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image). I have included my own reference image. Create a stylized cartoon/illustrated character inspired by the reference image - DO NOT make realistic depictions of real people, instead create charming cartoon-style characters with simplified, friendly features. This is the story opening - introduce key visual elements (colors, motifs, artistic style) that will continue throughout the other sections. Think of something unexpected, innovative, and memorable that will surprise and delight the recipient. Avoid generic designs! Style: in a warm and inviting watercolor and ink illustration style. The scene depicts the iconic Stanford University campus, with its distinctive Mission Revival architecture, bathed in the soft, golden light of a California afternoon. The colors are gentle and blended, with soft washes of ochre, terracotta, and warm sienna for the buildings, and lush, vibrant greens for the surrounding trees and lawns. Delicate ink linework adds definition and a handcrafted feel, capturing details without being rigid. In the foreground, subtle, blooming flowers and native California plants add a touch of natural beauty and organic life, symbolizing growth and prosperity. The overall effect is painterly, heartfelt, and deeply personal, focusing on the beautiful, shared human experience of gathering in an inspiring place, rather than the technology itself.

2. Left Interior (Story Development): UNLEASH YOUR CREATIVITY! You have complete creative freedom to design whatever you want for this left interior page! This is your artistic playground - create something genuinely innovative and unexpected that feels right for a Thank you - AI for Good Conference card with humorous and lighthearted tone. You can include: scenes, landscapes, objects, patterns, quotes, text, illustrations, realistic art, abstract art, or anything else that inspires you - but NO PEOPLE or characters unless the user specifically mentioned wanting people in their card description. Position any text safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10%). Think of something no one has done before! Surprise us with bold, imaginative, and memorable artistic choices while maintaining visual harmony with the overall card style and tone. Style: in a warm and inviting watercolor and ink illustration style. The scene depicts the iconic Stanford University campus, with its distinctive Mission Revival architecture, bathed in the soft, golden light of a California afternoon. The colors are gentle and blended, with soft washes of ochre, terracotta, and warm sienna for the buildings, and lush, vibrant greens for the surrounding trees and lawns. Delicate ink linework adds definition and a handcrafted feel, capturing details without being rigid. In the foreground, subtle, blooming flowers and native California plants add a touch of natural beauty and organic life, symbolizing growth and prosperity. The overall effect is painterly, heartfelt, and deeply personal, focusing on the beautiful, shared human experience of gathering in an inspiring place, rather than the technology itself.

3. Right Interior (Story Climax): BE CREATIVE WITH MESSAGE DESIGN! Include message text: "Jessica,
Thanks for joining us at the AI for Good Conference! It was great to see so many brilliant minds focused on creating a better future, and not just teaching robots to be better at Wordle than us. We're so glad you were part of it!" positioned safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image) integrated into beautiful, innovative decorative artwork. Think beyond typical florals and patterns - create something unexpected and artistic that perfectly frames the message - NO PEOPLE or characters. This should feel like the emotional peak of the card experience, harmonizing with the left interior as a cohesive spread. Avoid clichÃ© designs and create something genuinely special! Style: in a warm and inviting watercolor and ink illustration style. The scene depicts the iconic Stanford University campus, with its distinctive Mission Revival architecture, bathed in the soft, golden light of a California afternoon. The colors are gentle and blended, with soft washes of ochre, terracotta, and warm sienna for the buildings, and lush, vibrant greens for the surrounding trees and lawns. Delicate ink linework adds definition and a handcrafted feel, capturing details without being rigid. In the foreground, subtle, blooming flowers and native California plants add a touch of natural beauty and organic life, symbolizing growth and prosperity. The overall effect is painterly, heartfelt, and deeply personal, focusing on the beautiful, shared human experience of gathering in an inspiring place, rather than the technology itself.

4. Back Cover (Story Resolution): BE SUBTLY CREATIVE! Create a simple yet innovative decorative design that brings peaceful closure to the visual story. Reference subtle elements from the front cover but keep it minimal and serene - NO TEXT and NO PEOPLE, just beautiful, unexpected artistic elements that go beyond typical patterns or florals. Think of something quietly beautiful and memorable that complements the overall design while being genuinely unique. This should feel like a peaceful, artistic ending that surprises with its subtle creativity. Style: in a warm and inviting watercolor and ink illustration style. The scene depicts the iconic Stanford University campus, with its distinctive Mission Revival architecture, bathed in the soft, golden light of a California afternoon. The colors are gentle and blended, with soft washes of ochre, terracotta, and warm sienna for the buildings, and lush, vibrant greens for the surrounding trees and lawns. Delicate ink linework adds definition and a handcrafted feel, capturing details without being rigid. In the foreground, subtle, blooming flowers and native California plants add a touch of natural beauty and organic life, symbolizing growth and prosperity. The overall effect is painterly, heartfelt, and deeply personal, focusing on the beautiful, shared human experience of gathering in an inspiring place, rather than the technology itself.

VISUAL CONTINUITY CHECKLIST:
- Same color palette across all sections
- Consistent lighting/time of day
- Same artistic techniques and brushwork
- Recurring visual motifs or symbols (but make them unique and memorable!)
- Progressive emotional journey from introduction to resolution
- Front cover: stylized cartoon/illustrated characters if people are needed for the theme
- Left interior: CREATIVE FREEDOM but NO PEOPLE unless user specifically requested people in their description
- Right interior: focus on message space with innovative decorative elements (NO PEOPLE)
- Back cover: simple yet creative decorative design without text or people
- Use simplified, friendly, charming character design if including people (front cover only)
- CREATIVITY PRIORITY: Always choose the more innovative, surprising, and memorable option over generic designs

Return JSON:
{
  "frontCover": "detailed prompt with story opening elements",
  "backCover": "detailed prompt with story conclusion elements",
  "leftInterior": "detailed prompt with story development elements",
  "rightInterior": "detailed prompt with story climax elements"
}

IMPORTANT: Create a completely unique and different interpretation for this specific card variant. Use different creative approaches, color schemes, compositions, and artistic elements while maintaining the same core theme and requirements.

generatedPrompts.frontCover: Front cover of a greeting card with a flat 2D illustrated style, featuring a light cream background. The artwork is characterized by bold, clean lines and a limited, cheerful color palette. In the upper portion, a stylized building resembling a bell tower with a red dome is depicted, flanked by two palm trees on the left. A bright yellow sun-like shape with interconnected nodes, reminiscent of a neural network, is in the upper right. A curved banner of orange and pink, filled with binary code (01010101), flows from the building towards the sun. On the left, a sad, turquoise robot with its hand on its head is positioned. On the right, a woman with dark hair and glasses, wearing a magenta shirt, smiles and points towards the binary code. The central text, "THANK YOU - AI FOR GOOD CONFERENCE", is displayed prominently in bold, pink and teal sans-serif font, with the "THANK YOU -" in pink and "AI FOR GOOD CONFERENCE" in teal. The bottom section features two male characters. On the left, an older man with glasses and a green cap holds a piece of paper. On the right, a younger man with dark curly hair wears a dark teal t-shirt with "ISLAND OF SICILIA ITALIA" printed on it. Lush green stylized trees and bushes form the background for the lower characters, with small yellow dashes representing a path or ground. The overall mood is friendly, slightly humorous, and celebratory, with a clear visual narrative of technological advancement and human collaboration.
generatedPrompts.backCover: Back cover design for a greeting card with a minimalist, tech-inspired theme. The background is a deep teal with a subtle, repeating pattern of faint, illuminated binary code (0s and 1s) arranged in vertical streams. The dominant visual element is a stylized, classic incandescent light bulb, rendered in a warm, soft yellow gradient. Inside the glass bulb, the letters "IDEAS" are displayed, with each letter in a separate, textured green tile, reminiscent of old computer keycaps. The light bulb is positioned centrally, with its base slightly cropped at the bottom. The overall aesthetic is clean, modern, and conceptually linked to innovation and artificial intelligence, providing a simple yet memorable conclusion to a visual narrative. The style is flat 2D illustration with a subtle gradient effect on the light bulb and a faint glow emanating from it, against the flat background. There is no text other than within the lightbulb, and no visible space reserved for QR codes.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: Left interior page of a greeting card with a dynamic, interconnected network design. The background is a deep teal, textured with a subtle gradient, suggesting depth. Winding lines in vibrant teal, pink, and mustard yellow form a complex web, connecting circular nodes of varying sizes and shades of pink, teal, and yellow. Scattered throughout the network are stylized, flat illustrations of pink brain icons, symbolizing intelligence and thought. Prominent amongst these are bright, yellow lightbulbs with radiating lines, signifying ideas and innovation. There are also subtle inclusions of binary code, represented by white numbers "1" and "0" integrated into the lines, and a small, green recycling symbol. A tiny, yellow bird with teal wings is perched on one of the connecting lines. The overall style is modern, graphic, and minimalist, with a bold color palette that creates a visually engaging and slightly abstract representation of connectivity and progress. There is no text present on this page.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: Right interior page of a greeting card designed for message space with the following elements: A playful, oversized speech bubble, outlined in a thick, vibrant pink and a thinner black line, contains the printed message. The speech bubble has a cream-colored interior that serves as the primary area for handwritten messages. The text "Jessica, Thanks for joining us at the AI for Good Conference! It was great to see so many brilliant minds focused on creating a better future, and not just teaching robots to be better at Wordle than us. We're so glad you were part of it!" is displayed in a clean, modern, sans-serif font within this cream-colored area. The background of the entire page is a continuous, stylized digital pattern. This pattern features a bright teal color base with a subtle, faint overlay of binary code (0s and 1s) and interconnected nodes with thin white lines, resembling a network. Scattered across this digital background are two glowing lightbulb icons, depicted in a simple, stylized illustration. These lightbulbs are bright yellow with radiating lines and a teal base, emitting a soft yellow glow. The overall artistic style is flat 2D graphic design with a touch of whimsy. The composition is balanced, with the speech bubble prominently featured in the center, leaving ample space within for personalization. The color palette consists of bright teal, vibrant pink, cream, black, and yellow. The design evokes a sense of intellect and innovation with a lighthearted, humorous tone.
